title: TRS 1060 - Annex 6: Guideline on bioanalytical method validation and study sample analysis
chinese_title: 生物分析方法验证与研究样品分析指南

title: TRS 970 - Annex 3: Pharmaceutical development of multisource (generic) finished pharmaceutical products: points to consider
chinese_title: 多源（仿制）成品药的药品开发：需考虑的要点

title: TRS 970 - Annex 5: Development of paediatric medicines: points to consider in formulation
chinese_title: 儿科药物的开发：制剂中需考虑的要点

title: TRS 1060 - Annex 4: Good practices for blood establishments
chinese_title: 血液机构的良好实践
summary: This document is intended to provide guidance to blood establishment managers and staff on ensuring the quality and safety of blood and blood components for transfusion and plasma for further industrial fractionation.
chinese_summary: 本文旨在为血液机构的管理者和工作人员提供指导，以确保用于输注的血液和血液成分以及用于进一步工业分离的血浆的质量和安全。

title: TRS 1060 - Annex 3: WHO good manufacturing practices for excipients used in pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: WHO药品用辅料的GMP

title: TRS 1060 - Annex 2: WHO good practice considerations for the prevention and control of nitrosamines in pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: WHO关于药品中亚硝胺类物质预防与控制的GMP考虑因素

title: TRS 1052 - Annex 3: IAEA/WHO good manufacturing practices for in house cold kits for radiopharmaceutical preparations
chinese_title: 国际原子能机构/WHO 用于放射性药物制剂室内冷藏试剂盒的GMP
summary: This text has been developed in alignment with the International Atomic Energy Agency and World Health Organization guideline on good manufacturing practices for radiopharmaceutical products (1) and IAEA/WHO guideline on good manufacturing practices for investigational radiopharmaceutical products (2).
chinese_summary: 本文根据国际原子能机构和世界卫生组织关于放射性药物产品GMP的指南（1），以及IAEA/WHO关于研究用放射性药物产品GMP的指南（2）制定。

title: TRS 1052 - Annex 2: WHO good manufacturing practices for excipients used in pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: WHO药品中使用的辅料GMP

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 5: WHO good manufacturing practices for medicinal gases
chinese_title: WHO药品气体GMP
summary: Arising from an increased demand for medicinal gases, in particular the  use of oxygen in the treatment of patients with coronavirus disease 2019  (COVID-19), the World Health Organization (WHO) Health Products  Policy and Standards Department (formerly Essential Medicines and Health  Products) and other departments involved in the supply of oxygen and the  inspection of production sites of medicinal gases raised the urgency for the  preparation of the WHO good manufacturing practices for medicinal gases  guidance text.
chinese_summary: 鉴于对医用气体需求的增加，尤其是氧气在2019冠状病毒病（COVID-19）患者治疗中的广泛应用，世界卫生组织（WHO）卫生产品政策与标准司（原基本药物与卫生产品司）及其他参与氧气供应和医用气体生产场所检查的部门，迫切需要编制《WHO医用气体良好生产规范指导文件》。

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 2: WHO good manufacturing practices for sterile pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: WHO 的无菌药品 GMP
summary: This document is a revision of WHO good manufacturing practices for sterile  pharmaceutical products, previously published in the WHO Technical Report  Series, No. 961, Annex 6, 2011.1   The revision was done in collaboration with  the European Union and the Pharmaceutical Inspection Co-operation Scheme  (PIC/S). The harmonized text will benefit the national regulatory authorities  and manufacturers and save resources, thus improving patients’ access to quality  medicines.
chinese_summary: 本文是对世界卫生组织（WHO）无菌药品GMP的修订版，该版本曾于2011年发表在WHO技术报告系列第961号文件的附件6中。此次修订工作由欧洲联盟与药品检查合作计划（PIC/S）共同完成。统一后的文本将惠及各国监管机构和生产企业，并有助于节约资源，从而提高患者获得优质药品的机会。

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 6: WHO good practices for research and development facilities of pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: WHO药品研发机构的GMP良好规范
summary: This annex contains the World Health Organization (WHO) and United Nations  Population Fund (UNFPA) technical specification for TCu380A intrauterine  device (IUD), which is suitable for bulk procurement of the TCu380A IUD for  use in public sector programmes for family planning.
chinese_summary: 本附件包含世界卫生组织（WHO）和联合国人口基金（UNFPA）针对TCu380A宫内节育器（IUD）的技术规范，该规范适用于公共部门计划生育项目的TCu380A IUD批量采购。

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 7: WHO good manufacturing practices for investigational products
chinese_title: WHO GMP 适用于研究用产品的指南
summary: The objective of this update is to bring the guideline in line with current  expectations and trends in good practices and to harmonize the text with the  principles of other related international guidelines.
chinese_summary: 本次更新的目的是使指南符合当前良好实践的期望和趋势，并与其他相关国际指南的原则保持一致。

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 3: IAEA/WHO guideline on good manufacturing practices for investigational
chinese_title: 国际原子能机构/WHO关于研究用GMP的指南
summary: In view of the rapidly expanding field of molecular imaging and targeted  radiopharmaceutical therapy, combined with the absence of dedicated guidance  specific to the manufacture of investigational radiopharmaceuticals used in  both early and late clinical trials, the World Health Organization (WHO), in  partnership with the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), has raised the  urgency for the generation of a new IAEA/WHO guideline on good manufacturing  practices for investigational radiopharmaceutical products.
chinese_summary: 鉴于分子影像和靶向放射性药物治疗领域的快速扩展，加之目前尚缺乏专门针对用于早期和晚期临床试验的研究用放射性药物生产的指导方针，世界卫生组织（WHO）已与国际原子能机构（IAEA）合作，迫切需要制定一份新的IAEA/WHO关于研究用放射性药物产品GMP的指南。

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 4: WHO guidelines on technology transfer in pharmaceutical manufacturing
chinese_title: WHO关于药品生产中技术转让的指南
summary: During the fifty-fifth meeting of the World Health Organization Expert Committee  on Specifications for Pharmaceutical Preparations, Expert Committee members  were updated on the annual consultation on good practices for health products  manufacture and inspection, which took place in July 2020 over a series of  virtual meetings due to the COVID-19 pandemic. During these virtual meetings,  a group of experts made a series of proposals for future activities, including a  possible update of the WHO guidelines on transfer of technology in pharmaceutical  manufacturing (1).
chinese_summary: 在世界卫生组织药品规格专家委员会第五十五次会议期间，专家委员会成员听取了关于2020年7月因新冠疫情而通过一系列线上会议举行的卫生产品生产和检验良好实践年度磋商的最新情况。在这些线上会议上，一组专家就未来活动提出了一系列建议，其中包括可能对世卫组织药品生产技术转让指南进行更新（1）。

chinese_title: GMP：制药用水

chinese_title: GMP：验证指南

chinese_title: 非无菌药品的加热、通风与空调系统指南

chinese_title: WHO草药药品生产的GMP

title: TRS 1010 - Annex 1: WHO good manufacturing practices for the manufacture of herbal medicines
chinese_title: WHO 草药生产的 GMP

title: TRS 996 - Annex 3: WHO good manufacturing practices for biological products (jointly with the Expert Committee on Biological Standardization)
chinese_title: WHO 生物制品 GMP（与生物标准化专家委员会联合制定）
summary: This current revision reflects subsequent developments that have taken place in science and technology, and in theapplication of risk-based approaches to GMP (2–14). The content of this document should be considered complementary      to the general recommendations set out in the current WHO good manufacturing practices for pharmaceutical products: main principles (2) and in other WHO documents related specifically to the production and control of biological products.
chinese_summary: 本次修订反映了科学技术以及基于风险的GMP方法应用方面的最新进展（2–14）。本文件的内容应被视为对现行《WHO药品生产质量管理规范：基本原则》（2）及其他专门针对生物制品生产和质量控制的WHO文件中所载总体建议的补充。

title: TRS 992 - Annex 4: General guidance on hold-time studies
chinese_title: 关于留样研究的一般指导
summary: These guidelines focus primarily on aspects that should be considered in the  design of the hold-time studies during the manufacture of non-sterile solid dosage  forms. Many of the principles described here also apply to other dosage forms  such as liquids, creams and ointments. These guidelines do not cover aspects for  hold times in cleaning validation, or the manufacturing of active pharmaceutical  ingredients (APIs) or biologicals.
chinese_summary: 本指南主要关注非无菌固体剂型生产过程中留样稳定性研究设计中应考虑的各个方面。其中许多原则同样适用于液体、乳膏和软膏等其他剂型。本指南不涉及清洁验证中的留样时间，以及原料药或生物制品的生产相关方面。

title: TRS 986 - Annex 2: WHO good manufacturing practices for pharmaceutical products: Main principles
chinese_title: WHO药品GMP：主要原则
summary: Licensed pharmaceutical products (marketing authorization) should be  manufactured only by licensed manufacturers (holders of a manufacturing  authorization) whose activities are regularly inspected by competent national  authorities. This guide to GMP shall be used as a standard to justify GMP status,  which constitutes one of the elements of the WHO Certification Scheme on the  quality of pharmaceutical products moving in international commerce, through  the assessment of applications for manufacturing authorizations and as a basis  for the inspection of manufacturing facilities. It may also be used as training  material for government medicines inspectors, as well as for production, QC  and QA personnel in the industry
chinese_summary: 获准上市的药品（上市许可）应仅由获得许可的生产商（持有生产许可的机构）生产，这些企业的活动须定期接受国家主管当局的检查。本GMP指南将用作判定GMP合规性的标准，而GMP合规性正是世界卫生组织（WHO）国际药品贸易质量认证体系的重要组成部分之一，通过评估生产许可申请并作为工厂检查的基础来实现。此外，该指南还可作为政府药品监管人员的培训材料，以及供制药行业中的生产、质量控制和质量保证人员使用。

chinese_title: WHO关于质量风险管理的指南

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 8: Points to consider for setting the remaining shelf-life of medical products upon delivery
chinese_title: 医疗器械产品交付时剩余有效期的设定需考虑的要点
summary: Following the publication of Points to consider for setting the remaining shelf-life of  medical products upon delivery in 2020, a group from international agencies and  humanitarian organizations procuring health kits (including the International  Committee of the Red Cross, Médecins Sans Frontières, Save the Children,  United Nations Children’s Fund, United Nations Population Fund and the World  Health Organization) submitted a draft proposal for an amendment to include  emergency health kits used as part of the humanitarian response as an additional  example for consideration.
chinese_summary: 继2020年发布《关于确定医疗产品交付后剩余有效期的考虑要点》后，来自采购卫生包的国际机构和人道主义组织（包括国际红十字委员会、无国界医生组织、拯救儿童会、联合国儿童基金会、联合国人口基金以及世界卫生组织）的一个小组，提交了一份提案草案，建议增补一项修订内容，将作为人道主义应急响应一部分使用的紧急卫生包列为额外的参考示例。

chinese_title: 世界卫生组织（WHO）关于国际药品贸易中药品质量认证计划实施的指南

title: TRS 1025 - Annex 7: Good storage and distribution practices for medical products
chinese_title: 医疗产品的良好储存与配送规范
summary: Storage and distribution are important activities in the supply chain management of medical products. Various people and entities may be responsible for the handling, storage and distribution of medical products. Medical products may be subjected to various risks at different stages in the supply chain, for example, purchasing, storage, repackaging, relabelling, transportation and distribution.
chinese_summary: 储存和配送是医疗产品供应链管理中的重要活动。各类人员和实体可能负责医疗产品的搬运、储存和配送工作。在供应链的不同环节，例如采购、储存、重新包装、重新贴标、运输和配送等阶段，医疗产品可能会面临各种风险。

title: TRS 961 - Annex 9: Model guidance for the storage and transport of time and temperature sensitive pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: 时间和温度敏感型药品储存与运输的模型指南
summary: These guidelines set out the principal requirements for the safe storage and distribution of time- and temperature-sensitive pharmaceutical products (TTSPPs). They are based upon existing regulations and best practice guidance from a wide range of international sources, while accepting that local legislation and regulations will continue to take precedence. The target audience includes regulators, logisticians and pharmaceutical professionals in industry, government and the international agencies.
chinese_summary: 这些指南阐述了对时间和温度敏感的药品（TTSPPs）进行安全储存和配送的主要要求。它们以现有法规以及来自众多国际渠道的最佳实践指导为基础，同时承认地方立法和法规仍将继续优先适用。目标受众包括监管机构、物流人员，以及工业界、政府和国际机构中的制药专业人士。

title: TRS 992 - Annex 4: General guidance on hold-time studies
chinese_title: 关于留样研究的一般指导
summary: These guidelines focus primarily on aspects that should be considered in the  design of the hold-time studies during the manufacture of non-sterile solid dosage  forms. Many of the principles described here also apply to other dosage forms  such as liquids, creams and ointments. These guidelines do not cover aspects for  hold times in cleaning validation, or the manufacturing of active pharmaceutical  ingredients (APIs) or biologicals.
chinese_summary: 本指南主要关注非无菌固体制剂生产过程中留样稳定性研究设计中应考虑的各个方面。其中许多原则同样适用于液体、乳膏和软膏等其他剂型。本指南不涉及清洁验证中的留样时间要求，以及原料药或生物制品的生产相关事宜。

chinese_title: WHO起草现场主文件的指南
summary: The aim of these explanatory notes is to guide the manufacturer of medicinal  products in the preparation of an SMF that is useful to the regulatory  authority in planning and conducting GMP inspections.
chinese_summary: 本说明旨在指导药品生产商编制一份SMF，以帮助监管机构规划和实施GMP检查。

chinese_title: WHO的批准前检查指南

chinese_title: 药品生产企业的检查

title: TRS 1060 - Annex 2: WHO good practice considerations for the prevention and control of nitrosamines in pharmaceutical products

title: TRS 1044 - Annex 9: WHO/UNFPA guidance on natural rubber latex male condom stability studies
chinese_title: WHO/UNFPA 关于天然橡胶乳胶男用安全套稳定性研究的指南
summary: Manufacturers of natural rubber latex male condoms are required by regulatory  bodies to establish the shelf-life of their products prior to placing them on the  market. The methods and data used to establish the shelf-life are assessed as  part of the regulatory review processes. The United Nations Population Fund  (UNFPA) also requires data supporting shelf-life claims to be submitted as  part of the prequalification process for the procurement of natural rubber latex  male condoms.
chinese_summary: 天然橡胶乳胶男用避孕套的制造商须根据监管机构的要求，在产品上市前确定其保质期。用于确定保质期的方法和相关数据，将作为监管审查流程的一部分进行评估。此外，联合国人口基金（UNFPA）也要求，在采购天然橡胶乳胶男用避孕套的预审资格认证过程中，提交支持保质期声明的相关数据。

summary: The aim of the WHO Biowaiver List is to enable an informed decision as to whether or not a waiver from in vivo bioequivalence studies could be granted safely according to the WHO guideline on Biopharmaceutics Classification System based biowaivers (1).
chinese_summary: WHO生物豁免清单的目的是根据WHO关于基于生物药剂学分类系统进行的生物豁免指南（1），帮助决策是否可以安全地豁免体内生物等效性研究。

title: TRS 1060 - Annex 6: Guideline on bioanalytical method validation and study sample analysis

title: TRS 1052 - Annex 8: Multisource (generic) pharmaceutical products: guidelines on registration requirements to establish interchangeability
chinese_title: 多源（仿制药）药品：关于建立可互换性的注册要求指南
summary: These guidelines provide recommendations to regulatory authorities when defining requirements for approval of multisource (generic) pharmaceutical products in their respective countries. The guidance provides appropriate in vivo and in vitro requirements to assure interchangeability of the multisource product without compromising the safety, quality and efficacy of the pharmaceutical product.
chinese_summary: 这些指南为监管机构在各自国家制定多源（仿制）药品的批准要求时提供了建议。该指南提出了适当的体内和体外要求，以确保多源产品的可互换性，同时不损害药品的安全性、质量和有效性。

title: TRS 1052 - Annex 7: WHO guideline on Biopharmaceutics ClassificationSystem-based biowaivers
chinese_title: WHO基于生物药剂学分类系统的一致性豁免指南
summary: The WHO guideline on Biopharmaceutics Classification System-based biowaivers will supersede the BCS-based biowaiver section of the WHO Multisource (generic) pharmaceutical products: guidelines on registration requirements to establish interchangeability (1). The purpose of this document is to provide recommendations to support the biopharmaceutics classification of active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and the BCS-based biowaiver of bioequivalence studies for finished pharmaceutical products (FPPs).
chinese_summary: WHO基于生物药剂学分类系统的一致性豁免指南将取代WHO多源（仿制）药品：关于确立可互换性的注册要求指南（1）中基于BCS的一致性豁免部分。本文旨在提供相关建议，以支持原料药的生物药剂学分类，以及基于BCS的成品药生物等效性研究一致性豁免。

title: TRS 1052 - Annex 6: WHO Biowaiver List: proposal to waive in vivobioequivalence requirements for WHO Model Listof Essential Medicines immediate-release, solid oraldosage forms
chinese_title: WHO生物豁免清单：建议对WHO基本药物标准清单中的速释固体口服剂型免除体内生物等效性要求
summary: The WHO solubility classification, also referred to as the WHO Biowaiver List, is a tool for national regulatory authorities and pharmaceutical manufacturing companies, suggesting medical products that are eligible for a waiver from in vivo bioequivalence studies, which are usually necessary to establish the therapeutic equivalence with the originator (comparator). For exemption from an in vivo bioequivalence study, an immediate-release, multisource (generic) product should exhibit very rapid or rapid in vitro dissolution characteristics that are comparable to those of the reference product. A risk-based evaluation should also account for the excipients used in the formulation of the finished pharmaceutical product.
chinese_summary: WHO溶解度分类，也被称为WHO生物豁免清单，是供各国监管机构和制药生产企业使用的一种工具，用于推荐可免除体内生物等效性研究的药品。通常，此类研究是确立仿制药（参比制剂）与原研药（对照药）治疗等效性的必要步骤。为获得体内生物等效性研究的豁免，速释型多来源（仿制）产品应表现出与参比产品相当的极快或快速体外溶出特性。此外，基于风险的评估还应考虑成品制剂中所使用的辅料。

title: TRS 1025 - Annex 13: WHO guideline on the implementation of quality management systems for national regulatory authorities
chinese_title: WHO关于国家监管机构实施质量管理体系的指南
summary: The aim of this guideline is to assist NRAs to develop, implement and improve their QMSs, based on principles from International Organization for Standardization (ISO) document ISO 9001 standard requirements (5). It provides recommendations on what NRAs should implement and maintain under each QMS to effectively and efficiently support the execution of NRA functions as mandated by national laws and regulations. The guideline is expected to promote consistency in regulatory practices within and across NRAs, to facilitate harmonization, mutual reliance and recognition mechanisms among Member States.
chinese_summary: 本指南旨在帮助国家监管机构（NRA）根据国际标准化组织（ISO）文件ISO 9001标准要求中的原则，制定、实施并改进其质量管理体系（QMS）（5）。指南针对每个质量管理体系，提出了NRA应实施和保持的具体内容建议，以有效且高效地支持国家法律法规所赋予的NRA职能。预计该指南将促进各NRA内部及不同NRA之间的监管实践一致性，从而推动成员国间协调一致、相互信任与认可机制的建立。

title: TRS 1010 - Annex 10: WHO guidelines on stability testing of active pharmaceutical ingredients and finished pharmaceutical products
chinese_title: WHO关于原料药和成品药稳定性试验的指南
summary: The guidance on Stability testing of active pharmaceutical ingredients and  finished pharmaceutical products was published as Annex 2 in the World Health  Organization (WHO) Technical Report Series, No. 953, 2009 (1).  The aim of these regulatory guidelines is to outline the core stability data  package required for registration of active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and  finished pharmaceutical products (FPPs), replacing the previous WHO guidelines  in this area. The guidelines cross-refer to the series of related documents published  by the International Council for Harmonisation of Technical Requirements for  Pharmaceuticals for Human Use (ICH) (2) and other WHO guidelines.  It was recommended that at the time of their publication these guidelines  should also be applied to products that are already being marketed, making  allowance for an appropriate transition period, for example, they could become  applicable upon re-registration or upon re-evaluation.  The 2009 guidance not only followed the usual consultation process, but  it was also the result of numerous discussions with the various regulatory forums,  including ICH. As a result, the ICH parties withdrew one of their guidance texts  (Q1F) and published the following text on their website:
chinese_summary: 关于原料药和成品药稳定性试验的指导原则已于2009年作为世界卫生组织（WHO）技术报告系列第953号附件2发布（1）。这些法规性指导原则旨在概述注册原料药（API）和成品药（FPP）所需的核心稳定性数据包，以取代此前WHO在该领域的相关指南。这些指导原则与国际人用药品注册技术要求协调会（ICH）发布的系列相关文件（2）及其他WHO指南相互参照。建议在指南发布时，也应将其适用于已上市的产品，同时适当预留过渡期，例如可在重新注册或重新评估时开始实施。2009年的指导原则不仅遵循了常规的咨询流程，更是与包括ICH在内的多个监管机构论坛进行了多次深入讨论的结果。因此，ICH各参与方撤回了其原有的一份指导性文件（Q1F），并在其网站上发布了以下文本：

title: WHO List of International Comparator Products
chinese_title: WHO国际参比产品清单
summary: The list of international comparator products provides tabulated information about pharmaceutical products on the World Health Organization (WHO) Model List of Essential Medicines (EML), specific finished pharmaceutical products that can be selected as comparators (column headed “International comparator product”) and the markets where the product’s quality, safety and efficacy is considered as best documented (column headed “Market”). This list is for identifying comparator products for equivalence assessment of interchangeable multisource (generic) products. Comparator products recommended by the WHO Prequalification Team – Medicines (PQTm) are included in the list of international comparator products (column headed “PQ comparator product”). The list is compiled based on data publicly available and information provided by medicines regulatory authorities and manufacturers.
chinese_summary: 国际参比产品清单提供了世界卫生组织（WHO）基本药物标准清单（EML）中药品的汇总信息，列出了可作为参比品选择的具体成品药品种（栏目标题为“国际参比产品”），以及这些产品在哪些市场上的质量、安全性和有效性被认为有最充分的文献证据支持（栏目标题为“市场”）。该清单旨在帮助确定可互换的多来源（仿制）产品的等效性评估所用的参比品。由WHO药品预审评团队——药品（PQTm）推荐的参比产品已被纳入国际参比产品清单（栏目标题为“PQ参比产品”）。本清单依据公开可得的数据，以及药品监管机构和生产商提供的信息编制而成。
